verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib,<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Thou shalt therefore <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> it; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H5921>therewith,<s%> even the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> leavened <S%H7603>bread<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there any thing <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H2076>sacrificedst<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> remain all <S%H3885>night<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> within <S%H259>any<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee:

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in, <S%H8033>there<s%> thou shalt <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> at the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the <S%H4150>season<s%> that thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1310>roast<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6437>turn<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> unto thy <S%H168>tents.<s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread:<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shalt thou <S%H5608>number<s%> unto thee: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> from such time as thou <S%H4480>beginnest<s%> <S%H2490><s%> to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the <S%H7054>corn.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the LORD thy God, according <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee:

And thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and thy <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and thy <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H7130>among<s%> you, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> after that thou hast <S%H622>gathered<s%> in thy <S%H4480>corn<s%> <S%H1637><s%> and thy <S%H4480>wine:<s%> <S%H3342><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H2282>feast,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and thy <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and thy <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are within thy <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou keep a solemn <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> thine <S%H8393>increase,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hands,<s%> therefore thou <S%H1961>shalt<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H8056>rejoice.<s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H2138>males<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose;<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles:<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> empty: <S%H7387><s%>

Every <S%H376>man<s%> shall give as he is <S%H4979>able,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

Judges <S%H8199><s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> shalt thou <S%H5414>make<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, throughout thy <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5186>wrest<s%> <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>gift:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H7810>gift<s%> doth <S%H5786>blind<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H5557>pervert<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

That which is altogether <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H6664><s%> shalt thou <S%H7291>follow,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> thee a <S%H842>grove<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thee.
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou set thee <S%H6965>up<s%> any <S%H4676>image;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hateth.<s%>
